com.example.bot.spring

Class MessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bot.spring.MessageFactory

  • public class MessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a Message Factory utilizing factory pattern. This class is responsible for the creation of Message objects and its various types. Including TextMessage, TemplateMessage and ImageMessage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageFactory()
      Default constructor of MessageFactory with no image path list provided.
      MessageFactory(java.lang.String path)
      Constructor of MessageFactory with only one image.
      MessageFactory(java.lang.String[] pathList)
      Constructor of MessageFactory with a list of image paths to be used.

    • Method Summary

      Factory metthod for TemplateMessage ie Carousel.

      Factory method for any type of Message specified by a String parameter.

      Factory method for TextMessage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageFactory

        public MessageFactory()
        Default constructor of MessageFactory with no image path list provided. Using this constructor will leave the URIs list empty and assume no image used immediately.

      • MessageFactory

        public MessageFactory(java.lang.String[] pathList)
        Constructor of MessageFactory with a list of image paths to be used. This allows images be used in the Message creation. Images should be placed in resources/static/ so that it has path "/static/IMAGE_NAME"
        Parameters:
        pathList - A String array of paths of images to be used.

      • MessageFactory

        public MessageFactory(java.lang.String path)
        Constructor of MessageFactory with only one image. This allow only one image to be used. Images should be placed in resources/static/ so that it has path "/static/IMAGE_NAME" The image will be used for all Message that require the image.
        Parameters:
        path - A String of path of the image to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • createTextMessage

        public com.linecorp.bot.model.message.TextMessage createTextMessage(java.lang.String text)
        Factory method for TextMessage. Creates a TextMessage that looks like a normal text message sent by another account. see https://developers.line.me/en/docs/messaging-api/message-types/#text-messages
        Parameters:
        text - A String containing the text message.
        Returns:
        A TextMessage object.

      • createCarouselMessage

        public com.linecorp.bot.model.message.TemplateMessage createCarouselMessage(int columns,
                                                                            int buttons,
                                                                            java.lang.String[] contents)
        Factory metthod for TemplateMessage ie Carousel. Creates a TemplateMessage that has a number of rows and different contents and buttons. For each row, the first 2 arguments in contents are title and description respectively. Then for each button, the first argument is the Action type, the second is the button name, and the third and fourth are the Action parameters. The images used are in sequential order as the order of creation At most there can be 10 columns in one carousel message, and 3 buttons each column. https://developers.line.me/en/docs/messaging-api/message-types/#template-messages
        Parameters:
        columns - The number of columns shown in this Carousel
        buttons - The number of buttons in each column.
        contents - The contents of each button
        Returns:
        Templatemessage for carousels

      • createImageMessage

        public com.linecorp.bot.model.message.ImageMessage createImageMessage()
        Factory method for ImageMessage. Creates an image message that can be viewed by the user. This will use the first image path during construction of this factory. see https://developers.line.me/en/docs/messaging-api/message-types/#image
        Returns:
        A ImageMessage containing the image or a placeholder in case no image was found.

      • createMessage

        public com.linecorp.bot.model.message.Message createMessage(java.lang.String type,
                                                            java.lang.Object... param)
        Factory method for any type of Message specified by a String parameter. This creates a general Message object given the type as parameter. The types can be "text", "carousel", "image".
        Parameters:
        type - A String specifying the type of Message.
        param - Any number of String inputs that suit the need of that type of Message.
        Returns:
        A Message object of the suitable type.
